lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update IntelliJ to the most recent version.
1. Open IntelliJ (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Import the project into IntelliJ as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
1. After that, locate the `src/main/java/Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run Duke.main()`. If the setup is correct, you should see something like the output below.
Duke is a personal assistant chatbox which helps you keep track of various to-do's, deadlines and events. The name Duke
chosen as a placeholder name, in honor of Duke, the Java Mascot.
Adds a to-do's to the task list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 1 task in the list.
Adds an event to the task list. Note that the format for `TIME` should take the form of `YYYY-MM-DD`
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
Adds a deadline to the task list. Note that the format for `TIME` should take the form of `YYYY-MM-DD`
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
Prints all task(s) in the list.
Here are the tasks in your list:
Prints all tasks containing the keyword given by the user.
Here are the matching task(s) in your list:
Deletes the task with the given index. Note that the index given should be valid.
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
Marks a task with the given index as done. Note that the index given should be valid.
Nice! I've marked this task as done:
Prints all tasks occurring on a specified date.
Here are the task(s) occurring on the same date in your list:
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
Add Todo | `todo DESCRIPTION`  e.g.`todo CG1112 final project`
Add Event | `event DESCRIPTION /at TIME`   e.g.`event CS2113T team meeting /at 2021-03-07 14:00`
Add Deadline | `deadline DESCRIPTION /by TIME`   e.g.`deadline submit CS2113T iP /by 2021-03-05 23:59`
Find Task on Date | `date DATE`   e.g.`date 2021-03-10`
* AddCommand helps the user adds a task.
* Adds a task of the correct type, print it out to the user and store it in Duke.txt.
* @param matchedTasks the list of matched tasks
* @param sameDateTasks the list of tasks occurring on the same specified date
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen during add command execution
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
* Command can create commands to be executed.
* Executes the command based on the specific command type.
* @param matchedTasks the list of matched tasks
* @param sameDateTasks the list of tasks occurring on the same specified date
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen during command execution
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
* DateCommand helps the user finds a task which occur on the date specified.
* Finds a task which occur on the date specified and print it out to the user
* @param matchedTasks the list of matched tasks
* @param sameDateTasks the list of tasks occurring on the same specified date
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen during add command execution
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
* DeleteCommand helps the user delete a task.
* Deletes a task and updates Duke.txt.
* @param matchedTasks the list of matched tasks
* @param sameDateTasks the list of tasks occurring on the same specified date
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen during add command execution
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
* DoneCommand helps the user marks a specific task as done.
* Marks a specific task as done and updates Duke.txt.
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
* ExitCommand helps the user exit the program.
* Changes isExit to be true, prints the exit message and exit the program.
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
* FindCommand helps the user find task(s) containing the keyword.
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
* ListCommand helps the user print the task(s) in the list.
* @throws DukeException the exceptions which can happen
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage, TaskList matchedTasks, TaskList sameDateTasks)
